name: Tomb Of Friends
description:
Tomb of Friends is a videogame in which you make lots of friends.

Features:

  • Over 12 friends you can befriend
  • Over 3 quirky characters
  • If you're bored, lots of replayability
  • A handful of secret boys
  • Save points
  • Tons of Dogs
  • Maybe the friends are more than 12

Please play the game. I haven't eaten in four months


Check out the Let's Play by Panoots!
